actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to preserve and promote the resources of the Connecticut River Valley.

summary.text: Establishes the Connecticut Historic Riverway for the preservation and promotion of the Connecticut River Valley. Establishes the Mount Holyoke Riverway Committee to consult with the Secretary of the Interior on the development and administration of the Valley.

titles.title: A bill to preserve and promote the resources of the Connecticut River Valley.
